main event: Multiple sightings of unusual aerial objects reported in Beloit, Wisconsin between August 1 and August 12, 1955.
interesting points: Four round objects estimated to be three times the size of a baseball were observed, with colors varying between white and bright red., The objects were reported to move in a steady course, first from north to south and then south to north., The sightings included descriptions of objects making sharp turns resembling intelligent control., Witnesses included the chief of police and a ground observer corps member., Investigations suggested the sightings may have been attributed to meteor showers occurring around the same time.
witness description: chief of police and other observers from the Ground Observer Corps
